<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2062</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The measurement of Students' attitudes towards scientific field trips</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Messen der einstellungen der Kursteilnehmer 
gegenüber wissenschaftlichem fangen Reisen auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La mesure des attitudes des étudiants envers des
voyages de domaine scientifique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A medida de atitudes dos estudantes para 
desengates de campo científico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La misura degli atteggiamenti degli allievi nei 
confronti dei viaggi di campo scientifico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μέτρηση της στάσης των σπουδαστών απέναντι στα 
επιστημονικά ταξίδια πεδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La medida de las actitudes de los estudiantes 
hacia disparos al campo científicos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article discusses the attitudes of students towards scientific field trips . It is based on the findings of a questionaire developed as a tool to ascertain the influenceof the field trip on on the learning abiltity of geology students.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">field trips</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning environment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel behandelt die Haltung der 
Kursteilnehmer in Richtung zu wissenschaftlichem auffangen 
Reisen. Er basiert auf den Entdeckungen eines questionaire, das 
als Hilfsmittel entwickelt wird, um das influenceof zu ermitteln die 
auffangenreise an auf dem erlernenabiltity der 
Geologiekursteilnehmer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet article discute les attitudes des étudiants 
vers des voyages de domaine scientifique. Il est basé sur les 
résultats d'un questionaire développé comme outil pour s'assurer 
l'influenceof le voyage de zone en fonction sur l'abiltity d'étude 
des étudiants de géologie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo discute as atitudes dos estudantes 
para desengates de campo científico. É baseado nos findings de
um questionaire desenvolvido como uma ferramenta para verificar o 
influenceof o desengate de campo sobre no abiltity de aprendizagem de 
estudantes da geologia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo discute gli atteggiamenti degli 
allievi verso i viaggi di campo scientifico. È basato sui 
risultati di un questionaire sviluppato come strumento per accertare 
del influenceof il viaggio di campo sopra sul abiltity imparante degli
allievi di geologia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο συζητά τις τοποθετήσεις των σπουδαστών 
προς τα επιστημονικά ταξίδια πεδίων. Είναι βασισμένο στα 
συμπεράσματα ενός ερωτηματολογίου που αναπτύσσεται ως εργαλείο 
για να εξακριβώσει το influenceof το ταξίδι πεδίων επάνω στο 
abiltity εκμάθησης των σπουδαστών γεωλογίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este artículo discute las actitudes de 
estudiantes hacia disparos al campo científicos. Se basa en los
resultados de un questionaire desarrollado como herramienta para 
comprobar el influenceof el disparo al campo encendido en el abiltity 
que aprende de los estudiantes de la geología.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fangen Sie Reisen auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenumgebung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">voyages de zone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">environnement d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desengates de campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ambiente de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">viaggi di campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ambiente imparante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταξίδια πεδίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαθησιακό περιβάλλον</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">geología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">disparos al campo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ambiente que aprende</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
